subject: Subject: Order Status Inquiry – December 30th Purchase
description_text:
Hi there,
I hope you’re doing well. I’m reaching out regarding an order I placed on
Tuesday, December 30th. I received the confirmation email, but I haven’t
yet received any update about the shipment.
Could you please let me know the current status of my order and when I can
expect it to be shipped? I’m planning to feature these pedals in an
upcoming YouTube review, so having an estimated timeline would be really
helpful for my production schedule.
Thank you in advance for your help. I appreciate it and look forward to
hearing from you.
Best regards,
Pedro

conversations.body_text: Hi pedro simoes,  Please provide the recipient’s information, order amount, order date, and destination country. Once the payment is successfully completed, we will ship orders in sequence according to the order timeline.

Hi pedro simoes,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.   https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510438629067/trackdetails
